message.content:
I'll calculate the Net Profit Margin based on the income statement.

Step 1: Identify the Net Profit amount from the income statement.
Net Profit = $3,744,117.89

Step 2: Identify the Total Revenue amount from the income statement.
Total Revenue = $28,572,608.70

Step 3: Calculate the Net Profit Margin using the formula:
Net Profit Margin = (Net Profit / Total Revenue) × 100%
Net Profit Margin = ($3,744,117.89 / $28,572,608.70) × 100%
Net Profit Margin = 0.13104 × 100%
Net Profit Margin = 13.10%

Therefore, the Net Profit Margin is 13.10%.

```json
{"solution": {'Net Profit Margin': '13.10%'}}
```
